# Module: tf.compat.v2.keras.wrappers.scikit_learn

Wrapper for using the Scikit-Learn API with Keras models.



Defined in [`python/keras/api/_v2/keras/wrappers/scikit_learn/__init__.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/python/keras/api/_v2/keras/wrappers/scikit_learn/__init__.py).
